SalesContractLine.name: SalesContractLine
SalesContractLine.description: Stores a contract's product information, including price, quantity, and components covered.

Description.description: The description of the sales contract line.

EffectiveEndDateTime.description: The date from which the line item is effective.

EffectiveStartDateTime.description: The date till which the line item is effective.

ExpenseRecoveryType.description: Specifies the type of expense recovery from the supplier.

IsPartReturnRequired.description: Indicates whether it's mandatory for the manufacturer to return the product to the supplier for the supplier contract to apply.

LastReferencedDate.description: The timestamp when the current user last accessed this record indirectly, for example, through a list view or related record.

LastViewedDate.description: The timestamp when the current user last viewed this record or list view.

LineItemNumber.description: The unique number of the line item.

Name.description: Name of the contract line item.

OriginalLineItemId.description: ID of the original line item that this line item references (for example if this line item is due to a contract amendment).

Product2Id.description: Product ID associated with the line item.

ProductCode.description: Product code associated with the line item.

Quantity.description: Product quantity associated with the line item.

Status.description: Status of the contract line item.

TotalPrice.description: The total price of the line item based on the quantity and unit price.

UnitPrice.description: The price of a single unit of the line item.
